tickets.contactFormDescription: Please fill out the form below to contact our team. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
tickets.contactEmailDesc: We will use this email address to respond.
tickets.contactEmailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
tickets.contactTopicMinLength: Topic must be at least 5 characters.
tickets.contactContentRequired: Message of at least 20 characters is required.
tickets.contactFormInvalid: Please fill in all required fields.
tickets.contactSuccess: Your request has been sent. Ticket #{ticketId}.
tickets.userDescription: View and manage your support tickets here. You can track the status of your requests, add additional information if necessary, and view responses from support.
tickets.userNoAccessMessage: Your account is not enabled for support access. Please contact your administrator.
tickets.responseContentDescription: Write your response or additional details to the ticket
tickets.responseAddedSuccessfullyDesc: Your response has been added to the support ticket.
tickets.supportDescription: View and manage support tickets for all users here. You can track the status of requests, add additional information if necessary, and view responses from users.
tickets.faqTopicDesc: This part will be the text summarizing the FAQ question.
tickets.faqPubResponseDesc: This part will contain the public response to the frequently asked question in the FAQ.
tickets.faqLlmResponse: RResponse used to train the LLM.
tickets.faqLlmResponseDesc: This part will contain the response used to train the language model (LLM) to improve automatic answers to user questions.
tickets.ticket-creation-body-empty: Support ticket content cannot be empty
tickets.ticket-creation-content-too-short: Support ticket content is too short, title or content must not be empty
tickets.ticket-content-invalid-markdown: Support ticket content contains invalid markdown syntax
tickets.tickets-creation-user-not-found: User creating the support ticket was not found
tickets.tickets-creation-anonymous-invalid-email: The email provided is not valid
tickets.tickets-creation-anonymous-not-allowed: Anonymous ticket creation is not allowed
tickets.ticket-creation-public-email-missing: Email is mandatory for anonymous ticket creation
tickets.ticket-creation-public-email-missing-inv: Email is mandatory for anonymous ticket creation
tickets.tickets-ticket-access-denied: You don't have the rights to access this support ticket
tickets.tickets-ticket-not-found: The requested support ticket was not found
tickets.tickets-update-user-is-inactive: The requested ticket belongs to an inactive user
tickets.tickets-faq-invalid-context: Invalid FAQ context parameters, it's not an FAQ ticket
